info.title: Elite API
info.description:
A backend API for https://elitebot.dev/ that provides Hypixel Skyblock data.

Use of this API requires following the [Elite API TOS](https://elitebot.dev/apiterms). This API is not affiliated with Hypixel or Mojang.

get.description: Retrieves the Minecraft account information for a given player, along with an overview of their profiles and player data.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: Player uuid or ign

get.description: Returns a 72x72 face png image of the Minecraft account associated with the provided player name or UUID. 72x72 response includes the player's "hat" overlay. If not found, returns Steve's face.
Returns a 72x72 face png image of the Minecraft account associated with the provided player name or UUID. 72x72 response includes the player's "hat" overlay. If not found, returns Steve's face.

get.description: Retrieves a list of guides waiting for approval.

post.description: Approves a pending comment, making it visible to all users.
Approve a pending guide and publish it.
Add a guide to user's bookmarks/favorites.

delete.description: Remove a guide from user's bookmarks.

post.description: Create a new comment on a guide.
Initializes a new empty guide draft for the user.

get.description: Search and list published guides with optional filtering and sorting.

post.description: Create a new guide tag. Moderator only.

delete.description: Soft delete a guide. Only the author or an admin can delete.

put.description: Update the draft version of a guide. Only the author can update their own guide.

delete.description: Delete a guide tag. Moderator only.

put.description: Update an existing guide tag. Moderator only.
Edit comment content. Authors can edit their own comments, admins can edit any.

get.description: Retrieve a guide by its slug. Use ?draft=true to view draft version (requires author/mod permission).
Returns all guides bookmarked by the user. Only the owner can see their bookmarks.
Returns all guides by a specific user. Shows only published guides for anonymous users. Author sees all their own guides.
Returns all comments for a specific guide.
Returns a list of all comments pending approval.
Returns all available guide tags.

post.description: Reject a pending guide submission with an optional reason.
Submit a draft guide for admin review.
Revert a published guide back to draft status. Only author or admin can unpublish.
Cast an upvote (+1) or downvote (-1) on a comment.
Cast an upvote (+1) or downvote (-1) on a guide.

parameters.description: Discord Snowflake ID of the requested resource (guild, user, etc.)

parameters.name: guildId
parameters.description: Guild id to fetch members for (discord/hypixel guild id)

parameters.name: leaderboard
parameters.description: Id of leaderboard

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Time interval key of a monthly leaderboard. Format: yyyy-MM

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description:
Game mode to filter leaderboard by. Leave empty to get all modes.
Options: "ironman", "island", "classic"

parameters.name: removed
parameters.description:
Removed filter to get leaderboard entries that have been removed from the leaderboard.
Default is profiles that have not been removed/wiped.
0 = Not Removed
1 = Removed
2 = All

weightStyle.description: Selected weight style for the user

leaderboardStyle.description: Selected leaderboard style for the user

nameStyle.description: Selected name style for the user

weightStyle.description: Name of weight style to use.

weightStyleOverride.description: Ability to override other's weight styles.

moreInfoDefault.description: Show "More Info" on weight command by default.

hideShopPromotions.description: If shop promotions should be hidden.

accounts.description: Member fortune settings for each minecraft account, then each profile.

strength.description: Amount of strength used for mooshroom fortune

face.description: Base64 data image of the 8x8 face

hat.description: Base64 data image of the 8x8 hat (overlay on the face)

width.description: The original width of the image.

height.description: The original height of the image.

sources.description: A dictionary of available image sources, keyed by a logical name (e.g., "small", "medium").

url.description: The fully-qualified public URL for this image variant.

width.description: The width of this image variant in pixels.

amount.description: Populated when sorting guilds by a specific collection or skill

ErrorResponse.description: the dto used to send an error response to the client

statusCode.description: the http status code sent to the client. default is 400.

message.description: the message for the error response

errors.description: the collection of errors for the current context

discriminator.x-deprecatedMessage: Discriminator is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.

entitlements.description: Purchased entitlements from the Discord store

target.description:
Target of entitlement.
0 = None
1 = User
2 = Guild

consumed.description: Consumed status of the entitlement if applicable

available.description: If the product is available for purchase

weightStyles.description: Name of weight style to unlock.

weightStyleOverride.description: Ability to override other's weight styles.

moreInfoDefault.description: Show "More Info" on weight command by default.

customEmoji.description: Ability to have custom name emoji for the user.

maxMonthlyEvents.description: Maximum number of events that can be created in a month. (For guilds)

maxJacobLeaderboards.description: Maximum number of jacob leaderboard that can be active at once. (For guilds)

ProblemDetails.description:
RFC7807 compatible problem details/ error response class. this can be used by configuring startup like so:
app.UseFastEndpoints(c => c.Errors.UseProblemDetails())

title.default: One or more validation errors occurred.

name.description: the name of the error or property of the dto that caused the error

weightStyleId.description: Selected weight style for the user

leaderboardStyleId.description: Selected leaderboard style for the user

nameStyleId.description: Selected name style for the user

banner.description: Image URL for the event banner

startTime.description: Start time of the event as a string in Unix seconds

joinUntilTime.description: Join time of the event as a string in Unix seconds

endTime.description: End time of the event as a string in Unix seconds

maxTeams.description: Max amount of teams allowed in the event, 0 if solo event, -1 if unlimited

maxTeamMembers.description: Max amount of members allowed in a team, 0 if solo event, -1 if unlimited

requiredRole.description: Discord role id required to participate in the event

blockedRole.description: Discord role id blocked from participating in the event

guildId.description: Discord server id as a string

targetLabel.description: Label for the target of the announcement (e.g. "Read more", "View article")

targetUrl.description: Url to read more about the announcement

targetStartsAt.description: Optional time stamp for when the topic of the announcement starts

targetEndsAt.description: Optional time stamp for when the topic of the announcement ends

expiresAt.description: Announcement expiration date (will no longer be shown after this date)

targetLabel.description: Label for the target of the announcement (e.g. "Read more", "View article")

targetUrl.description: Url to read more about the announcement

targetStartsAt.description: Optional time stamp for when the topic of the announcement starts

targetEndsAt.description: Optional time stamp for when the topic of the announcement ends

expiresAt.description: Announcement expiration date (will no longer be shown after this date)

pending_confirmation.description: The pending confirmation for the user, if any

expires_in.description: Expiry date of the access token in Unix timestamp seconds

pending_confirmation.description: The pending confirmation for the user, if any

first_login.description: If this is the user's first login

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the contest in seconds since unix epoch.

blockedRoles.description: Blocked roles from participating in the guild's Jacob Leaderboards

blockedUsers.description: Blocked users from participating in the guild's Jacob Leaderboards

requiredRoles.description: Required roles to participate in the guild's Jacob Leaderboards

excludedParticipations.description: Excluded participations from the guild's Jacob Leaderboards

excludedTimespans.description: Excluded timespans from the guild's Jacob Leaderboards

leaderboards.description: Leaderboards for the guild's Jacob Leaderboards

guildId.description: The Discord server id as a string for the event

description.description: An optional description for the event

rules.description: An optional set of rules for the event

prizeInfo.description: An optional description of prizes for the event

startTime.description: Unix timestamp for the start time of the event in seconds

endTime.description: Unix timestamp for the end time of the event in seconds

joinTime.description: Unix timestamp for the latest time a new member can join the event in seconds

requiredRole.description: A Discord role id that is required to participate in the event

blockedRole.description: A Discord role id that is blocked from participating in the event

maxTeams.description: Max amount of teams allowed in the event, 0 if solo event, -1 if unlimited

maxTeamMembers.description: Max amount of members allowed in a team, 0 if solo event, -1 if unlimited

name.description: An array of strings for the team name, example: [ "Bountiful", "Farmers" ]

joinCode.description: Join code for the team, only populated if authenticated user is the owner

cropWeights.description: The weights of each crop in the event

name.description: An array of strings for the team name, example: [ "Bountiful", "Farmers" ]

changeCode.description: If join code should be changed

lastSave.description: Last save time in unix seconds
Last save time in unix seconds

reason.description: Optional reason for rejection to provide feedback to the author.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the contest pings feature is enabled for the guild.

channelId.description: Channel ID to send contest pings to.

alwaysPingRole.description: Role ID to ping when a contest starts.

cropPingRoles.description: Individual roles to ping when a contest for a specific crop starts.

delaySeconds.description: Not in use yet. Delay in seconds before sending the ping.

itemId.description: Item Id if this is a collection leaderboard

minimumScore.description: The minimum score required to be on the leaderboard

profile.description: Player's profile name if player leaderboard

uuid.description: Uuid of the player or profile

mode.description: Game mode of the entry. Classic profiles are considered default/null.

xp.description: Skyblock xp of the player (used for sorting)

itemId.description: Item Id if this is a collection leaderboard

minimumScore.description: The minimum score required to be on the leaderboard

itemId.description: Item Id if a collection based leaderboard

profile.description: If true, the leaderboard is profile based

minimumScore.description: Minimum score required to be on the leaderboard

scoreDataType.description: Score data type of the leaderboard

rank.description: Current rank of the player (-1 if not on leaderboard)

amount.description: Current score of the player (0 if not on leaderboard)

initialAmount.description: The starting amount of the leaderboard entry for interval based leaderboards

minAmount.description:
The minimum amount required to be on the leaderboard. If this is a time based leaderboard,
this score is instead required on the normal leaderboard before the player can be on the
time based leaderboard

upcomingRank.description: The starting rank of the returned upcoming players list

id.description: Old Minecraft id of the item

count.description: Minecraft stack count of the item

damage.description: Minecraft damage value of the item

uuid.description: Item UUID to uniquely identify a specific instance of this item

name.description: Item name, first line of the lore

lore.description: List of item lore in order

gems.description: Applied gems with gem rarity, null for an unlocked gem slot without a gem

petInfo.description: Pet info if item is a pet

textureId.description: Texture id for the item, used to look up the image in our image service

slot.description: Slot identifier where the item was located, if applicable

items.description: Dictionary of slot to item mapping, null if the slot is empty

variedBy.description: Data used to generate variant key (easier to parse)

lowestVolume.description: Volume of prices used to get the lowest recent price

lowest3Day.description: Lowest price seen in 3 days (excluding outliers)

lowest3DayVolume.description: Volume of prices used to get the lowest 3 day price

lowest7Day.description: Lowest price seen in 7 days (excluding outliers)

lowest7DayVolume.description: Volume of prices ued to get lowest 3 day price

name.description: Name of the item if it exists.

npc.description: NPC sell price of the item if it exists.

sell.description: Instant Sell price taken directly from most recently fetched data

buy.description: Instant Buy price taken directly from most recently fetched data

sellOrder.description: Sell Order price calculated from most recently fetched data

buyOrder.description: Buy Order price calculated from most recently fetched data

averageSell.description: Calculated average Instant Sell price that should be more resistant to price fluctuations

averageBuy.description: Calculated average Instant Buy price that should be more resistant to price fluctuations

averageSellOrder.description: Calculated average Sell Order price that should be more resistant to price fluctuations

averageBuyOrder.description: Calculated average Buy Order price that should be more resistant to price fluctuations

orders.description: Current orders in the bazaar for this item if they exist.

data.description: Data from the Hypixel items endpoint

available.description: If the product is available for purchase

releasedAt.description: Unix seconds timestamp of release date

packId.description: Texture Pack ID where the item texture is located

networth.description: Networth calculation result for this item

JWTBearerAuth.description: Enter a JWT token to authorize the requests...
